title: OT103: The Curse Of Tutancomment
summary:
Key ideas:
- The post is a bi-weekly open thread where readers can post anything they want or ask random questions.
- The author, Scott, is on vacation for the next few weeks.
- The author gives advice on how to meet the rationalist community in the Bay Area.
- The Link Without Comments button can be used to share SSC posts without including the comments section.

Key learnings:
- The community center is a good place to meet the rationalist community in the Bay Area.
- There is a guest room available for interested visitors.
- The Link Without Comments button can be used to share SSC posts without including the comments section.

Key questions:
- None mentioned in this portion of the blog post.
